gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Mavericks 113, Jazz 97
gameRecap.excerpt: The Mavericks won their third straight game and the seventh of their last eight as they defeated the Jazz, 113-97. Luka Doncic led Dallas with 34 points, nine rebounds, eight assists, and four steals as Daniel Gafford added 24 points, seven rebounds, and five assists. Lauri Markkanen led Utah with 21 points, three rebounds, and two assists. The Mavericks move into the sixth seed in the West with the win as they improve to 41-29 while the Jazz fall to 29-41.
